decks.notes: The deck is focused on aggressive play, aiming to quickly deal damage to the opponent's life total. It includes powerful creatures with abilities that can help push damage through, along with burn spells to clear blockers or finish off the opponent. The deck also utilizes cards that benefit from dealing damage, providing additional value for attacking. The mana base is streamlined to support the aggressive game plan, with a mix of Snow-Covered Mountains and utility lands like Ramunap Ruins and Den of the Bugbear to ensure consistent access to red mana.

The deck focuses on a fast-paced, aggressive strategy with strong card draw and spell-slinging capabilities. By utilizing cards like Arclight Phoenix and Picklock Prankster to put pressure on the opponent, while also having access to removal and countermagic options, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly. The inclusion of Treasure Cruise and Temporal Trespass helps maintain card advantage and ensures a steady stream of threats. Overall, the deck seeks to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent through efficient spell casting and strategic decision making.

The deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo involving Greasefang, Okiba Boss and Parhelion II to overwhelm the opponent. It includes various cards to support this combo, such as Fleeting Spirit and Monument to Endurance. Additionally, there are disruptive elements like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to control the game state. The deck also features a mix of lands to ensure consistency in mana production. Ultimately, the aim is to execute the combo efficiently and close out the game with overwhelming force.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly establish a board presence with efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Questing Druid, while disrupting the opponent with burn spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage. The deck aims to apply consistent pressure and close out the game quickly with aggressive creatures and direct damage, utilizing cards like Soul-Scar Mage and Kumano Faces Kakkazan. The inclusion of land cards like Den of the Bugbear and Ramunap Ruins provide additional reach and flexibility in the late game.

The main concept of this Gruul Aggro deck is to quickly play aggressive creatures and spells to deal damage to the opponent as quickly as possible. The deck includes fast and efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage, along with direct damage spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage. The inclusion of cards like Kumano Faces Kakkazan and Den of the Bugbear also provide additional sources of damage. By applying constant pressure and using burn spells to finish off the opponent, this deck aims to win the game before the opponent can set up their own strategy.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells to control the board and deal direct damage. The key strategy is to maintain a fast and relentless offensive presence, utilizing creatures like Monastery Swiftspear, Kumano Faces Kakkazan, and Emberheart Challenger, along with efficient burn spells like Burst Lightning and Reckless Rage. The deck aims to end the game swiftly before the opponent can stabilize or mount a significant defense.

The deck focuses on utilizing Greasefang, Okiba Boss and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to create a powerful combo with Parhelion II. The deck also includes disruption cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to control the opponent's board. The mana base is designed to support the combo pieces and ensure consistent casting of spells. Additionally, cards like Overlord of the Balemurk and Bloodtithe Harvester provide additional value and threats to the opponent. The inclusion of removal spells like Vanishing Verse and Torch the Tower helps to deal with opposing threats effectively.

This Aggro Rakdos deck focuses on early aggression and disruption, utilizing cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to control the board while applying pressure with creatures like Bloodtithe Harvester and Graveyard Trespasser. The deck also has some burn spells like Blightstep Pathway and Abrade to finish off opponents quickly. Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Kolaghan's Command provide late-game power and versatility to close out games. Ultimately, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with fast-paced threats and disruption, leading to a swift victory.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on aggressive plays and disruption, utilizing cards like Fatal Push, Thoughtseize, and Kolaghan's Command to disrupt the opponent's strategy while pushing damage through with Bloodtithe Harvester and Mutavault. The deck also includes graveyard hate with Sokenzan, Crucible of Defiance and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to control the board and maintain pressure. The inclusion of cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Graveyard Trespasser provide additional ways to keep the opponent on the back foot and secure victory through a mix of aggression and disruption.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The key strategy is to apply early pressure with creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Emberheart Challenger, while using burn spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage to clear the way and finish off the opponent. The deck also utilizes land cards like Den of the Bugbear and Ramunap Ruins for additional reach and damage. Overall, the goal is to deal damage quickly and efficiently to secure a fast victory.

The focus of this UW Control deck is to maintain board control and disrupt the opponent's strategy through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. The deck includes cards that provide card draw, removal options, counterspells, and powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Narset, Parter of Veils. The deck aims to control the game by answering threats and gradually gaining incremental advantages until it can close out the game with powerful finishers.

The main focus of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to apply pressure on the opponent quickly and efficiently. By utilizing aggressive creatures like Bloodtithe Harvester and Mutavault, as well as disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Duress, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while dealing damage consistently. The inclusion of powerful finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Sokenzan, Crucible of Defiance helps to close out the game in a swift manner. Additionally, the deck includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat to handle any threats the opponent may present.

The main concept of this Pioneer Aggro - Weenie White deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of low-cost creatures and pump them up with cards like Thalia's Lieutenant and Adeline, Resplendent Cathar. The deck also focuses on protecting key creatures with cards like Dauntless Bodyguard and Suki, Courageous Rescuer. Using cards like Recruitment Officer to fetch more creatures and Mutavault to provide additional threats, this deck aims to outpace the opponent and secure victory through aggressive and efficient play.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with instants and sorceries to recur Arclight Phoenix and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive spells and creatures. By utilizing cheap card draw and efficient removal, the deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent while also disrupting their game plan. The inclusion of Hall of Storm Giants and Otawara, Soaring City adds flexibility and power to the deck, allowing for different win conditions and strategic choices. Ledger Shredder provides additional graveyard synergy, further enhancing the deck's ability to consistently bring back Arclight Phoenix.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on equipping creatures with powerful artifacts such as Colossus Hammer and Shadowspear to deal fast and efficient damage to the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Sigarda's Aid and Portable Hole to support the aggressive strategy. Key creatures like Kemba, Kha Enduring and Kellan, the Fae-Blooded help to generate additional threats on the battlefield. With a combination of low-cost creatures and powerful equipment, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly and secure victory before they have a chance to stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells, putting constant pressure on their life total. Utilizing hasty creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Emberheart Challenger, along with efficient burn spells like Burst Lightning and Reckless Rage, the deck aims to quickly reduce the opponent's life total to zero. With a mix of creatures and direct damage spells, the deck looks to maintain a fast pace and close out games before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.
